description: Nyotaimori turns dining into art, with fresh sashimi served on a human canvas. With over a decade in the industry, we bring this ancient tradition to life.
location: Citrus Reigns 10 m S from Citrus plaza

description: On the Very Hungry Borderlander tried everything. She had two Sweet Spot pancakes, a magic brownie, some mystery cocktails, a dodgy line, and some party gummies. She danced for hours. Her pupils became planets. Still no sleep, but she was still hungry.
location: Everywhere

description:
A private, sexy as fuck, 30-minute session (solo or with friend/partner) with a professional, sexy as fuck, photographer. 

!!! Limited slots - so application required PRIOR to Borderland to: mirjavirginiaandersson@gmail.com !!!
Professionally edited images will be delivered after Borderland.
location: Citrus Reigns 55 m N from Electron plaza

description: Step into a calming space where you can laugh, play, move or be still. Talk or listen. A place for pure relaxation and unexpected meet-ups. Let your soul breathe. Enter inside this shiny bubble as it floats along on the wind of time. Move or melt. You are invited to just be. Welcome home
location: Eclipse, 70m E from The Villa

description: Crying circuits, skinned illusions. To unveil is to remember what was always there — to call spirit back into matter, to give life to what is by all measures lifeless. What illusions must we shed to witness something truly alive? This film screening asks us what it means to care.
location: Lucky 26 m SE from Topless plaza

description: On the Very Hungry Borderlander meant to go to a workshop, but landed in a cuddle-orgy in the bunker. She tried a ginger fig, raided the communal kitchen, got sunburned and dehydrated. Still no sleep, but she was still hungry.
location: Everywhere

description:
Try the Laser Harp – wave your hands, break the beams, summon the sound. No strings, just light, energy, and a soundscape shaped by you.
Check FB, Discord, or message me @mrchph for other opportunities
location: South of the Swamp

description: Step into a calming space where you can laugh, play, move or be still. Talk or listen. A place for pure relaxation and unexpected meet-ups. Let your soul breathe. Enter inside this shiny bubble as it floats along on the wind of time. Move or melt. You are invited to just be. Welcome home
location: Eclipse, 70m E from The Villa

description: On the Very Hungry Borderlander broke. She wasn’t hungry any more. She was crispy. Fried. Emotionally composted. Her brain began to crackle like vinyl. The fun wasn’t as fun. She resolved to play even harder in the hope the fun would get more fun again.
location: Everywhere

event: Making of TentaLume - Behind the scenes of an interactive audiovisual tentacular animatronic installation
description: Curious about how one creates an animatronic tentacle monster? Want to learn about interactive installation construction through 3D printing, programming, electronics, DMX control, and silicone molding? Come by for a casual technical chat and a behind the scenes look at how “TentaLume” was built.
location: Eclipse,  The Villa

description: A guided tour for visitors showing the art, camps, and creativity of our burn. Inspired by Communal Effort and Civic Responsibility we share what’s happening in Alversjö. Some artists and reality leads will share their creations. You’re warmly welcome to join as a guide or contribute in any way.
location: Threshold, 302m W from North Lake

description: Step into a calming space where you can laugh, play, move or be still. Talk or listen. A place for pure relaxation and unexpected meet-ups. Let your soul breathe. Enter inside this shiny bubble as it floats along on the wind of time. Move or melt. You are invited to just be. Welcome home
location: Eclipse, 70m E from The Villa

description: As the sun rose on the Very Hungry Borderlander crawled into her tent. She had a stomach ache, a sore head and couldn’t remember why she was here. She slept through the whole of ‘Special Friday’ - (which was a narrow escape).
location: Everywhere

description: Step into a calming space where you can laugh, play, move or be still. Talk or listen. A place for pure relaxation and unexpected meet-ups. Let your soul breathe. Enter inside this shiny bubble as it floats along on the wind of time. Move or melt. You are invited to just be. Welcome home
location: Eclipse, 70m E from The Villa

description: Step into a calming space where you can laugh, play, move or be still. Talk or listen. A place for pure relaxation and unexpected meet-ups. Let your soul breathe. Enter inside this shiny bubble as it floats along on the wind of time. Move or melt. You are invited to just be. Welcome home
location: Eclipse, 70m E from The Villa

description: Step into a calming space where you can laugh, play, move or be still. Talk or listen. A place for pure relaxation and unexpected meet-ups. Let your soul breathe. Enter inside this shiny bubble as it floats along on the wind of time. Move or melt. You are invited to just be. Welcome home
location: Eclipse, 70m E from The Villa

description: Relax and drop in at Psychedelic Cinema. This year features AI visions from among others Black Eye Media & Fredrik Johnsson. Mesmerizing visuals and immersive soundscapes carry you from dusk till deep night. Non stop drop in & out.  Stay as long—or as strange—as you like.
location: Big White Tent at the crossroads between Citrus Reigns, Eastern Void and Swamp

description: Welcome to the world of Sand—where all you create will vanish, all you say returns, and time and space play hide and seek. Creations dissolve, only to be reborn in another’s vision. Nothing lasts, yet everything transforms
location: Eclipse, 70m E from The Villa

description: On the Very Hungry Borderlander awoke. Calm, clear-headed, renewed and thought: "Maybe I could help out?". She went for a swim, picked up moop, helped out at Sanctuary, did a shift with the Clown Police and cooked for her camp. After that she felt much better.
location: Everywhere

description: Do you have a small bag or item that you want to check in until next borderland? then drop it off at the Tiny bag check, Borderlands smallest wardrobe, and you will get it back in 2026. don’t loose your claim ticket! also open Sunday.
location: At an entrance to the barn

description: Step into a calming space where you can laugh, play, move or be still. Talk or listen. A place for pure relaxation and unexpected meet-ups. Let your soul breathe. Enter inside this shiny bubble as it floats along on the wind of time. Move or melt. You are invited to just be. Welcome home
location: Eclipse, 70m E from The Villa

description: On the Very Hungry Borderlander emerged from her tent… transformed! She was a beautiful butterfly, glowing with L-wire wings and an open heart. She had found a rhythm - balance amid the chaos - and now was full of ideas for next year.
location: Everywhere

description:
This is it.
Pick a sign, step into a role, and spark connection! Grab one from our sign library - then wear it, swap it, or pass it on to someone who fits the part. A playful, portable icebreaker all week long.
location: Eclipse, 94m NE from The Villa

description: In the light of the moon a little egg lay on a leaf. On Monday morning out of the egg came a tiny, very hungry, very excited Borderlander! She had a tent, a pack of glitter and no idea what was coming. She started looking for all the fun and stayed up all night. But she was still hungry.
location: Everywhere

description:
Clitorial Confessional
Step into a tipi and reflect, share, or simply listen. A quiet space for anyone with a clitoris to connect with their body and contribute anonymously to a collective artwork. No judgment—just honesty, curiosity, and care. Clitoris United!
location: Eclipse 85 m NW from Mid-vibe plaza

event: The Ball Spa: A Self-Love Sanctuary
description: Sticky balls? Treat them right at The Ball Spa — a playful, self-guided space to learn testicular care. Wash, groom, check for lumps, and pamper your pair with steam, mirrors, and guides. It’s tender, weird, and educational. Privacy, consent, and laughs guaranteed.
location: Eclipse 85 m NW from Mid-vibe plaza

description: Players enter into our witchy den and learn the ways of mashup magic
location: Citrus Reigns, NE from Minibar Plaza

description: Step into a world where kink meets analog—a space where art, desire, and vintage media collide. We’re building an exhibition of kinky using only vinyls, cassettes, and wild imagination. A space to explore the beauty of bodies, sensuality, and expression. Join us on Tuesday to create some art too.
location: Citrus Reigns 24 m NE from Circus plaza

description: Dreamer’s Maze is a multi-room, multi-level immersive interactive art experience. It is located within an indoor labyrinth inside the Villa. Each room is designed by different artists. The Maze is a living organism. It breathes, listens, and responds.
location: Eclipse, at The Villa

description:
Come by and record your stories, secrets, dreams, jokes, or desires, the only rule is that you have to whisper.
The recordings will be played later in the week at the Whispering Forest, a sound installation nestled deep in the woods. After the week, they’ll be deleted and never heard again.
location: Villa Hutlös in Eastern Void

description: Log in to Hyperstition’s Speakeasy to watch the CAMGIRL — a Unicode-encrypted live stream projected from a secret cambooth. Watch her, or become her? Charm the cam-madame, she decides who goes live! A ritual of reclaiming the gaze through encrypted exhibitionism in a world that never stops watching
location: The camgirl is hiding inside the Hyperstition Deep State Speakeasy

description: Log in to Hyperstition’s Speakeasy to witness the CAMGIRL — a live, Unicode-encrypted stream projected from a hidden cambooth. Watch her… or become her? Charm the madame and see if she lets you go live. A ritual of exposing yourself without revealing yourself — in a world that never stops watching.
location: Swamp 21 m NE from Electron plaza, Find the HYPERSTITION Deep State Speakeasy

description: Lets start the week off fancy! Come and make your own bracelet, necklace, bra or any other beauty out of vinyls. We provide all the tools an materials,
location: Citrus Reigns 24 m NE from Circus plaza

description:
Vinyl, cassettes, and wild imagination—take a forgotten record or an old tape and turn it into something sensual, surreal, or totally untamed. Let your fantasies flow, from poetic and romantic to raw and wild.
We’re building an exhibition of kinky art on analog and you can be a part of it.
location: Citrus Reigns 24 m NE from Circus plaza

description: Come be creative and make your own macrame bracelet. There is space for a maximum of 10 people.
location: Swamp 5 m E from Hidden oasis plaza

description: Welcome to Mugical Mushrooms! Sculpt your own fungi-inspired mug—maybe a truffle teacup, chanterelle chalice, amanita absinthe glass, or psilocybin porcelain? No experience needed. Just clay, creativity, and a dash of mycelial magic. Come get mugical!
location: Lucky, 151m SE from The Church

description: Few things are as important to a burner as being shiny. Good thing the Shiny Workshop is here 💖💖 We bring lights, tools, inspiration and help, to make your outfit shine! Preferably you come to the workshop with an idea and an accessory or an outfit to decorate.
location: Swamp 71 m NE from Electron plaza

description: Come by to make your own bundle of yarn. We’ll bring some raw wool & tools and teach you to spin. You’ll meditate through your fingers and become a certified spinster.
location: Foajé Villa Hutlös, large pavilion, eastern forest side of Eastern Void.

description:
Do you love sunlight? And hard-to-control, stained-glass-like art? 
In this workshop, we will use sunlight, polarizing filters, tape and cellophane to create ‘paintings.’ The result is art, that appears, disappears or changes colours in unpredictable ways depending on how you view it.
location: At Station Creation at the camp Motherfluffers in southern Eclipse by the slope

event: Borderland Children’s Hopstial Bandage workshop (bandage, you pervert).
description: Learn to dress & bandage real or imaginary wounds with creative techniques! We provide materials; you bring body parts (or you can use our stuffed animals). From gauze to casts, we teach it all. Supplies limited—come early to rock a cool bandage or cast around Borderland!
host: Borderland children’s Hopsital / Doctors without orders
location: Lucky, 86 m SE from Hidden Oasis Plaza. Look for the big white hopsital tent in Kidsville

description: Tea & Craft Corner: Slow down, sip tea, and stitch some soul into the day. Bring your inner grandma energy to this cozy oasis with music and simple crafting: colouring, knitting, crochet. No pressure—just heart, hands, and a bit of tea-stained joy. Bring materials if you’d like—but no need!
host: Laura at The chill Of Us camp
location: Arctic chill, 151m S from North Lake

description:
Join us at the lake and make Borderlands biggest canvas with natural colors
You can paint the part of your body that needs color the most, press it onto the canvas. 
At this colorval there will be live music and you can also get your face painted. woaw if it sounds awesome come and join us
location: By the South Lake

event: Make-Up & Magic at the Pamper Temple
description:
Hejhej lovely people, come to our Pamper Temple and treat yourself!
We’ve got laid-back tunes, glitter, face make-up and nail polish.
Style yourself or others – or let our underwater mermaids glam you up.
This is your moment to shine!
location: Arctic chill, 98m S from North Lake

description: Welcome to a space where we create protection against the evils of the world. Here, being called a “tinfoil hat” is nothing but a compliment. Bring your favorite conspiracy theories. Don’t bring your phone.
host: Vagadome by Fanny K, Psychological Defense Agency
location: Citrus Reigns 10 m S from Citrus plaza

event: Soft Fire: A Boudoir Photo Ritual
description:
Join a slow, sensual boudoir photography ritual inside our temple of sounds – lit by warm cinematic light, surrounded by fabrics, feathers, and live ambient music.
You’ll be gently guided, seen, and celebrated in your body.
This is a space for quiet confidence, deep breath, and playful softness.
host: Temple of Sounds by Andreas Soteriou
location: Center of Lucky

description: Come craft with me! There will be threads and fabrics as well as tools to use. Feel free to bring your own clothing/material as well and we'll create whatever we feel like side by side.
location: Eclipse, 70m E from The Villa

description: Learn proper scrubbing techniques and surgical skills on real stuffed animals. Perform pretend amputations, attach objects, and practice precision. Become a certified stuffed-animal surgeon—serious training for the most important patients. No experience of equipment needed.
host: Borderland Children’s Hopsital / Doctors without Orders
location: Lucky 86 m SE from Hidden oasis plaza

description: An interactive installation blending tech and symbolism. It reveals each participant’s inner animal, drawn live by a robotic arm. The work explores the space between science and myth, inviting reconnection with the magical creatures found both in our inner worlds and out in our shared physicality.
location: Lucky

description:
Come together to build and bind a one-meter shamanic drum — a hands-on, collaborative process, powerful experience through rhythm, focus, and intentions.
There will be an opportunity to build your own rattle as well (limited quantity).
location: Eclipse 98 m W from Citrus plaza

description:
This is your invitation to The Color Carnival 🎨🌈
Come celebrate life with colors. Get painted, sip coffee, melt into live music and deep talks. Glam up old versions of you, paint new ones, or love a forgotten body part with color or bio-glitter.💖 
Find your color – or let it find you✨
location: Lucky, 119m SE from The Church

event: PWP (Paint without pressure - the Art of letting go)
description: Drop perfection and embrace freedom in this abstract painting workshop where process rules and judgment is banned. Let your hands speak, mind rest, and inner weirdo play. No skills needed, just curiosity. Create without pressure and rediscover joy, mindfulness, and connection.
location: In the middle of Eclipse, with two big tents and a van.

description: A tweet out to all birds that needs to fly high! 15:00-16:00 CRAFT AND CACKLE - DIY  headpieces, wings, and beaks. We provide feathers and tools, bring more flying equipment if you have! 16:00-17:00 FLIRT-A-THON - A bird's life in three phases, the peek, the hunt, and finally the mating dance.
location: Lucky, 10 m NE from Topless plaza, between Downtown and Swamp

event: Make-Up & Magic at the Pamper Temple
description:
Hejhej lovely people, come to our Pamper Temple and treat yourself!
We’ve got laid-back tunes, glitter, face make-up and nail polish.
Style yourself or others – or let our underwater mermaids glam you up.
This is your moment to shine!
location: Arctic chill, 98m S from North Lake

description: Mix weird substances, create medicines, experiment, invent names, and prescribe them to see what they do (and what side effects appear)! Our fully stocked lab awaits. No real meds included—unless you bring your own. Explore pharmacology—and maybe invent a cure-all!
host: Borderland Children’s hopsital / Doctors without Orders
location: Lucky 86 m SE from Hidden oasis plaza

event: Psychedelic Paint Jam — A Participatory Portal Where Colors Trip, Beats Drop, and a 10-Meter Canvas Comes Alive
description: As our DJ spins psychedelic beats, we’ll paint, move, and vibe together—each stroke a ritual, each color a shared dream. Not a show, but a portal. Trippy hippies, dusty artists, first-timers—all welcome. Body paint? Spirals? Visions? Hell yes. Bring your weird + wonder.
location: Citrus Reigns 13 m SW from Circus plaza

event: Psychedelic Paint Jam — A Participatory Portal Where Colors Trip, Beats Drop, and a 10-Meter Canvas Comes Alive
description: As our DJ spins psychedelic beats, we’ll paint, move, and vibe together—each stroke a ritual, each color a shared dream. Not a show, but a portal. Trippy hippies, dusty artists, first-timers—all welcome. Body paint? Spirals? Visions? Hell yes. Bring your weird + wonder.
location: Citrus Reigns 13 m SW from Circus plaza

description:
Do you have something broken that needs fixing?!
Memorylozers very own handyman is almost already on his way to you. If you tell him where and what it'll most certainly be done quicker.
And if you're lucky he’ll bring his minions with the skill to add a good time. 
Discord contact: tompamo
location: Arctic chill, 256m SW from North Lake

description: Station Creation
location: Eclipse 85 m NW from Mid-vibe plaza

event: Lint it to Win it: Bellybutton Fluff Donation Jar
description: Got lint? Put your hairy bellybutton to work and donate that gloriously useless fluff to something even more useless. Stuff it in our Collection Jar any time and receive a Certificate of Donorship. Multiple donations accepted. Enough fluff = possible hamster sweater. Do your part for recycling.
location: Middle of the Lucky

description:
Come have a shower! Dog and pjuske are bringing two, maybe more, LNT Camping Showers for everyone to use. You can cocreate by going to fill the sun-heated shower bags by the water station. LNT, so try not to use non bio degradables.
For location, WhatsApp +4551903149/ask The Glade.
-Dog and pjuske
location: The Glade (secret location)

description: Release your inner child and explore with all of your senses, here you will be able to engage in more in to sensory activities. The poppeling pot will offer you a number of stations which includes different types of arts and crafts, It will also offer you playground for both small and big burners.
location: Middle west of Lucky, next to the Jam Camp

description: Clothes and accessories to take - by all, for all! <3 The magical shared wardrobe returns! Last year it shimmered with swaps & smiles. Drop off your treasures in the donation box until Tuesday pm (when opend hang them yourself) your stuff will now serve outfits, alter egos & mindful reuse.
location: The Barn

description:
I had so much fun playing with all your hair last year so I’m back! 
Come and find me at the house of GLÖD to get your hair looked after by yours truly! (Tino). Due to time constraints I will be mainly focusing on shorter hair haircuts. 💇
location: House of glöd, Arctic chill, 98m S from North Lake

description: Create your unique scent to encapsulate your burning Borderland experience. Meet scent witch Kim or mix a fragrance by yourself whenever the mixing station is open.
host: The Fluffers camp, by yellow foxxx
location: Eastern Void

description: Bringing jungle-drum'n'base tunes and gluten free crêpes to the playa. You will be able to savor your delicious crêpe, bask in the sun 🤞, vibe to summer jungle DnB bass, or simply marvel at my naked 🍑 (wearing an apron for hygienic purposes only).
location: Forest Cave, 49m S from The Church

description: We open the Schorle Bar! We will be serving Schorle — a mix of fruity syrups and sparkling water — alongside playful games that help us determine the perfect Schorle for you.
host: The Witches of the Schorle Bar
location: Swamp 96 m SE from Electron plaza

description:
At the Sweet Spot, love is always in the air! It's the beginning of the burn, and we would love to help you find your special someone~
Come by to eat and make those special connections that can make your burn oh so much more memorable!
location: Citrus Reigns 7 m N from Mid-vibe plaza

description: At Lazy Camp, we take chilling seriously. While you relax, our crêpe wizard whips up Breton delights with salted caramel, apple jam & fruits. Veggie-friendly, not vegan or gluten-free. Bring a plate—no forks, just roll, bite, smile, repeat!
location: We will be next to Le salon, Bangers and RA

description:
A reliable, cozy space to relax and experience the ancient gift of tea. Take a break, write diary, connect with a friend, meditate and escape the FOMO.

We'll serve a selection of tea & drinks. If you like tea, bring some and we’ll brew together! If it’s rainy we’ll make a fire in the wooden stove
location: The Lookout in Lucky (near the stones & trees, towards the forrest)

description:
Bring your muscles and your sporty vibes! Enjoy BeefCakes™ as we serve a workout and delicious pancakes. Watch out for Coach because when he blows the whistle, you'd better be ready to burn those calories!
P.S. No actual beef is served. Just pure MUSCLES!
location: Citrus Reigns 7 m N from Mid-vibe plaza

description: Slip behind silk curtains where incense drifts and drums hum low. Lounge like a sultan, sip like a mystic, and vanish into the moment. The Forbidden Den awaits—a secret portal where tea spills stories, desire takes the lead, and the night’s best kept secrets are steeped just for you.
location: Eclipse 71 m W from Mid-vibe plaza

description: Journey on over to Kidsville to enjoy a Magnificent Hat Chocolate courtesy of Bogsy the Magnificent. Please be sure to wear your favourite Hot to ensure Magnificent service. (Disclaimer: Those Not wearing Hots may still be served Magnificent Hat Chocolate...)
host: At Kidsville courtesy of Bogsy the Magnificent
location: Swamp 24 m SE from Hidden oasis plaza

description: Welcome to join us for our “Gästabud” at the banquet table, and as the ancient proverb goes; “With great tables comes great feast abilities”. We will serve you home-brewed mead and viking treats, music and games. Bring your own cup and plate!
location: Camp Vikings & Dinosaurs @ Eastern void

description: You want to start the week by meeting other queer folks while grilling marshmallows? join us!. Wanna slow down, have something sweet, relax around a fireplace and exchange tips about how to perfectly grill a marshmallow? this is exactly what we are going to do, so come along, it’s gonna be cute.
location: Citrus Reigns 41 m NE from Mini bar plaza

description: Come and enjoy some Chai tea and join in our cuddle puddle in our cosy tipi!
host: Eva at The Chill Of Us camp
location: Arctic chill, 151m S from North Lake

description: A one-of-a-kind date night for anyone wanting to meet another delicious human more deeply, more playfully, and far from ordinary. Whether you’re single, partnered, relationship anarchist, monogamous, poly, queer, questioning, or some marvelous mix — this space is for you.
location: Swamp 8 m NE from Hidden oasis plaza

description:
A bold umami adventure! Taste experimental dry-aged beef aged in gochujang, miso, MSG and coffee. Come join in a food adventure that will be weird, wonderful and wild with flavors!
Stumble in on chance or find the location in the light! 
No event in case of rain.
location: Somewhere

description: Stop by for quesadillas & guacamole, enjoy a taste of Mexico, and fuel yourself with delicious snacks before exploring the burn.
location: We will be next to Le salon, Bangers and RA

description:
Hey kid! Come, come to Granny’s kitchen! One will smother you with love and pancakes, the other will judge your life choices. Play yard games, wait your turns like a good kid, and leave full—of carbs, laughs, and childhood flashbacks.
P.S. Actual kids are welcome too
location: Citrus Reigns 7 m N from Mid-vibe plaza

description: Care for a slice of Neapolitan-style margherita pizza while you are hanging out at the Burnes Magasin? This is the dream for filling your stomach and satisfying your taste buds while enjoying the vibes and activities of the Burnes Magasin camp. 50 pizzas or 300 slices will be made one evening
location: Lucky, 111m SE from The Church

description: Just two humble guys making our love for liqorice into a tradition! Do you yearn for the taste of the salty (and sometimes sweet) black gold? We’re once again hosting a liquorice tasting, bigger and tastier than ever! Also find us sharing this love around the playa during the rest of the week.
location: At the edge of Lucky, towards Forest Cave, 151m SE from The Church

description: If there is still dry aged beef left from the Secrete food experience from the day before it will enjoyed now. An experimental food tasting of dry aged beef that's been aged in MSG, miso, gochujang or coffee. Come and give your tastebuds an experience!
location: Forest Cave, 49m S from The Church

description: An unforgettable, decadent bistro experience where cheese is served on penises and paired with wine - a petite penitentiary of pleasure where rustic indulgence meets tongue-in-cheek power critique and absurdist ritual.
host: Macho Kitchen by Olivia Mezquida & Roger Dean Olden
location: Citrus Reigns

description: Dinner is served... hot, sticky, and straight from our private parts. At Pussies'n'Pancakes, we flip more than just pancakes. Come feast your mouth - it’s sensual, silly, and totally satisfying. Bring your own human plate and lick responsibly.
location: Citrus Reigns, 7 m N from Mid-vibe plaza

description:
Did you miss Slotheburg's morning coffee?! No problem - we will wake you up!
Join us for a session of spank-aches: Spanking, pancakes & awesome tunes!
This will be a shirt-cocking & blouse-cunting queue: Formal top & no pants.
location: Citrus Reigns 7 m N from Mid-vibe plaza

description: We’re firing up the BBQ for a carnal afternoon of sausages, coleslaw, and unapologetic meat. Juicy, greasy, macho as hell. Vegans welcome but not catered to. Come sultry, leave satisfied.
location: Citrus Reigns 80 m E from Mini bar plaza

event: Grab a cocktail and Touch Base
description: Grab a cocktail and touch base with old friends or new friends alike. All cocktails will be made with homemade liqueurs and other delicious ingredients. Open until 22:00 or until the bar has run out of ingredients. BYOC!
location: Middle of the Eastern Void

event: Divine Dough pizza and music evening
description: Come nourish your body and soul with artisan pizza, served straight from our hearts. Sit by the fire, share a moment with a new or old friend, and let gentle acoustic music wrap around you.
location: Swamp 8 m NE from Hidden oasis plaza

description: Craving something sweet after The Cabaret? Enter our karaoke stage, grab the mic & tantalize the crowd. Croon & swoon and you move to the front of the line. Enjoy playful tunes, irresistible moves & mouth-watering treats. Bring your sexiest voice & get ready to sing, sizzle & savor every moment!
location: Citrus Reigns 7 m N from Mid-vibe plaza

description:
Searching for new ways to connect? Maybe we can help you! Take a friend or we'll find you a stranger to feed each other a warm pancake. To make it more playful (or romantic), you will be blindfolded.
Please bring your own plate. Hand-feeding is recommended for the best experience.
location: Citrus Reigns 7 m N from Mid-vibe plaza

description: Welcome to Tant Siv's coffee party! 7 kinds of kakor, Melodikrysset, and Gösta popping in to say hej. Tant Thor and Maggan are coming—so find your inner granny and dress the part! Safe and cozy,  with the occasional squirt. Hourly weather updates on cassette. Välkommen!
location: Lucky 2 m E from Topless plaza

description: The Sweet Spot will celebrate the end of the burn by serving as many pancakes as we can. We want to get rid of all our batter, empty our jam jars, and end world hunger. We may pull it off, but only with your help! Wanna feel extra helpful? Bring an extra stove & pan and join the fry :)
location: Citrus Reigns 7 m N from Mid-vibe plaza

description: ​​Slip behind silk curtains where incense drifts and drums hum low. Lounge like a sultan, sip like a mystic. Let the warmth of tea ground you, and each sip become a gentle spell before the final night awakens. A temple of heat, haze and hidden desires.
location: Eclipse 71 m W from Mid-vibe plaza

description: Step into the Sin Bar — a glowing den of mischief and delight. Sweet poison in every glass, but one sip demands a sin: whisper a secret, break a rule, or draw your dark little fate. Temptation is served. Will you drink?
location: At Club SIN’s caSINo tent, north-east of Citrus, by Citrus Plaza.

description: No-bullshit brewed coffee served monday-saturday from 9 to 11 am. Atleast that is our ambition :) Welcome!
location: Eastern Void, m  from

description:
Follow the scent to the southern tip of Eclipse, where crispy delights, surprise twists, and loungey vibes await. We flip with flair, serve with love, and welcome all dusty dreamers.
We’re just a smell away.
location: NW of Eclipse

description:
Relax with the Hawaii Waffle! Feel the fullness of your wallet with the Capitalist Waffle! Or put a love spell on your crush on Witch-Waffle day.

Please help us serve more hours of the day (and night)! Send an sms to +46723221189 if you want to join in or just show up and sign up on our schedule!
location: A wagon with red and white striped roof, rolling around serving the people.

description: Float by Slothenburg for fire-baked saj, golden olive oil, za’atar from the stars, and dreamy labaneh fermented from our secret probiotic yogurt. Melt-in-your-mouth delicious, microbiome-loving, and fully Ga-Lactic. Take the trip.
location: Citrus Reigns 24 m SE from Mini bar plaza

description: 🧇Waking up with the scent of vegan waffels combined with the notes of freshly made espresso☕️.
